pr_title: [#10140] Add comment search functionality in the backend

timeline.message: Refactor resource endpoints and define API output format

timeline.bodyText: Please create a new protected constructor in SessionResultsData, you won't need FeedbackSessionResultsBundle
timeline.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: In that case, would CommentSearchResultData even need a FeedbackSessionResultsBundle (as opposed to a different type to retrieve the FeedbackSessionData)?
replies.author: madanalogy

replies.bodyText: Why you need FeedbackSessionResultsBundle in the first place? Does Logic#searchFeedbackResponseComments gives you FeedbackSessionResultsBundle?
replies.author: xpdavid

replies.bodyText: Good point, let me take a closer look and define the constructor properly.
replies.author: madanalogy

timeline.message: Implement SearchCommentsAction and clean up unused action
Implement logical skeleton for data transform
Implement data transform to output logic

timeline.bodyText: There is a nice builder for ResponseOutput merged recently. You can take advantage on that.
timeline.author: xpdavid
xpdavid

replies.bodyText: The reduction is to find participant comment? You should use isCommentFromFeedbackParticipant() instead?

replies.bodyText: Yes it was to find participant, I did not know about that method thank you for the suggestion :)

timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: What is student comment? Do you mean ResponseComment? ParticipantComment？

Utilise builder methods in SessionResultsData

timeline.bodyText: The backend should have no knowledge about what the data is going to be used so we should not mention here. Instead, mention what the action does.
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: If you are not using questionStatistics why define it here in the first place?
timeline.author: xpdavid

timeline.bodyText: Follow good indentation here? Each line should only have one withXX?

timeline.bodyText: Why we are not filtering out participantComment here?

timeline.message: Clean up code style and documentation

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we can break up this one-liner for better readability?
timeline.author: Derek-Hardy

replies.bodyText: Looks okay to me. Where would you suggest the breakpoint be?
replies.author: madanalogy

replies.bodyText:
I felt output of buildResponses() can be separate out and saved as a variable?
So that it is easier to see what are the params for new QuestionOutput()

replies.bodyText: Yeap, I put the params of new QuestionOutput() to a new line :)
replies.author: madanalogy

timeline.bodyText: Since this method has the potential to return null, it could be better to have a bit Javadoc to explain when we will get CommentOutput and when will it be null?
timeline.author: Derek-Hardy

timeline.message: Add documentation to explain null CommentOutput
Add response details when building ResponseOutput
